name: Hamburger
description: Two fresh high-quality beef patties hot off the grill, on a soft, toasted bun.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Two-patty burger with two slices of melted American cheese added.

name: Doner Kebab
description: A typical kebab consists of bread stuffed with doner meat shavings, lettuce, sliced tomato and onions

name: Kofta Kebab
description: consists of bread stuffed with Lettuce,sliced tomato and onions!

name: Hot Dog
description: Our All-beef Hotdog,topped with a slice of melted American cheese.

name: Veggie Sandwich
description: a layer of avocado , diced tomatoes, cucumber slices, bell pepper strips, lettuce, mashrooms and mozzarella cheese slices

name: Lentil Soup
description: red lentils, carrots and leeks. It's low in calories

name: Pepperphoni Pizza
description: The Pepperphoni Pizza is topped with meat-free 'Pepperphoni' made from pea protein

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: consists of boneless, skinless chicken breast served between slices of bread, with pickles,tomatoes

name: Salmon Fish
description: two slice of salmon fish with chips or salad

name: Smoked Fish
description: two slice of smoked fish with chips or salad

name: Apple Juice
description: A fresh glass of  apple juice

name: Orange Juice
description: A fresh glass of orange juice

name: Pineapple Juice
description: A fresh glass of Pineapple juice

name: Peach Juice
description: A fresh glass of  Peach juice

name: Beer
description: Different kinds of beers:Corona,Estrella,Peroni Nastro Azzurro,Camden,Pale Ale,..

name: Wine
description: Different kinds of wines : Shiraz,Cabernet Sauvignon,Merlot,Pinot Noir,Malbec,..

name: Gin Tonic
description: A Glass of Gin and Tonic Water Poured over a large amount of ice

name: Coffee
description: Different Kinds of Coffee : Espresso,Latte,cappuccino,Mocha

name: Water
description: A Bottle or Glass of Water

name: Coca Cola
description: A Can of Coca Cola

name: Diet Coke
description: A Can of Diet Coke

name: Tiramisu
description: layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.

name: Raspberry Cheese Cake
description: It tastes of the cream cheese,a perfect balance of tanginess from the cream cheese and sweetness.

name: Baklava
description: It is a rich, sweet dessert pastry made of layers of filo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: It is prepared with full chocolate. In every bits and pieces you can get the taste of chocolate

name: Carrot Cake
description: Carrot cake is a sweet and moist spice cake, full of cut carrots and toasted nuts.

name: English Custard
description: It is smooth, creamy, gently sweet,a little eggy and delicious

name: Lemon Drizzle Cake
description: An amazingly moist lime loaf cake,tastes fresh and delicious. You will love every slice of this lime drizzle cake.

name: Salted Caramel Cheesecake
description: The flavor as slightly sweet and slightly tart but more sweet than tart.Cheesecakes are often topped with strawberries,cherries.

name: Waffle
description: It made from a batter that consists of flour, water, baking powder, oil, and eggs.

name: Pancakes
description: Most pancakes begin as a mixture of flour, eggs, milk, and butter, are fried on a greased griddle, and are circular in shape

name: Ice Cream
description: 5 scope of different kinds of flavours,you can choose your flavours
